about_the_game:
You don't have to be stuck in a time loop to experience the world of In Stars and Time over and over and over again. Just pick up this original soundtrack by Studio Thumpy Puppy. From Dormont to the depths of the House of Change, across snack time and fierce battles, these 41 tracks will sweep you along on Siffrin's strange journey.
✨ Be warned, Disc 2 contains spoilers for Act 3 of In Stars and Time onwards! ✨

package_groups.title: Buy In Stars And Time Soundtrack

short_description: No time loop? No problem! Experience Siffrin's captivating journey whenever you want by picking up the original In Stars and Time soundtrack by Studio Thumpy Puppy. Snacks, battles, and dramatic revelations await your ears. We promise you'll want it to start again, start again, start again.
